author: Stereogum
title: Watch Father John Misty Play “Total Entertainment Forever” & “Pure Comedy” On SNL
text: Father John Misty brought his many talents and facial expressions to Saturday Night Live last night, serving as the Octavia Spencer-hosted episode's musical guest. He performed new song " Total Entertainment Forever " and the title track to his upcoming album Pure Comedy, backed by a full band with a horn section and everything. More »
